00051 void DataSetTest::setUp()
00052 {
00053         data = new GenericData;
00054         GenericFileReader reader;
00055         std::string name = TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE;
00056         reader.SetFilename(name);
00057         reader.ReadHeader(*data);
00058         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00059         data->Header().GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd);
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin != dchEnd);
00061         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00062         dchBegin->GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin, dphEnd);
00063         void* handle = MapFile(name);
00064         dataPlane = new DataSet(data->Header().GetFilename(), *dphBegin, handle);
00065 }
00066 
00067 void DataSetTest::tearDown()
00068 {
00069         UnmapFile();
00070         if (dataPlane)
00071                 dataPlane->Delete();
00072         delete data;
00073 }

00076 {
00077         DataSetHeader header;
00078         DataSet* dc = new DataSet(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE, header,0);
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dc != 0);
00080         dc->Delete();
00081 }

00126 void DataSetTest::testproperty_Header()
00127 {
00128         // Get the DataSetHeader
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00130         const DataSetHeader& header = dataPlane->Header();
00131 
00132         // Get the DataSetHeader from the FileHeader to check against
00133         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00134         data->Header().GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd);
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dchBegin != dchEnd);
00136         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00137         dchBegin->GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin, dphEnd);
00138 
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetName() == dphBegin->GetName());
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetDataSize() == dphBegin->GetDataSize());
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetRowSize() == dphBegin->GetRowSize());
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetNameValParamCnt() == dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt());
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetColumnInfo(0) == dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0));
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetColumnCnt() == dphBegin->GetColumnCnt());
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(header.GetRowCnt() == dphBegin->GetRowCnt());
00146 }

00148 void DataSetTest::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Single()
00149 {
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00151 
00152         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00153         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00154         {
00155                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00156                 u_int16_t value;
00157                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00158                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00159         }
00160 
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00162 }

00201 void DataSetTest::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Vector_InChunks()
00202 {
00203         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00204 
00205         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00206         int32_t chunks = 7;
00207         int32_t rowsPerChunk = rows/chunks;
00208 
00209         for (int32_t chunk = 0; chunk < chunks; ++chunk)
00210         {
00211                 int32_t startRow = chunk*rowsPerChunk;
00212                 Uint16Vector values;
00213                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(0, startRow, rowsPerChunk, values));
00214 
00215                 int32_t rowsInVector = rowsPerChunk;
00216                 if (dataPlane->Rows() < startRow+rowsPerChunk)
00217                         rowsInVector = dataPlane->Rows() - startRow;
00218 
00219                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values.size() == rowsInVector);
00220 
00221                 // Check the values
00222                 for( int32_t row = startRow; row < rowsInVector+startRow; ++row )
00223                 {
00224                         u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00225                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row-startRow] == expected);
00226                 }
00227         }
00228 
00229         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00230 }

00232 void DataSetTest::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw()
00233 {
00234         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00235 
00236         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00237         u_int16_t* values = new u_int16_t[rows];
00238         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetDataRaw(0, 0, rows, values));
00239 
00240         // Check the values
00241         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00242         {
00243                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00244                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row] == expected);
00245         }
00246 
00247         delete [] values;
00248 
00249         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00250 }

00252 void DataSetTest::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw_TooManyRows()
00253 {
00254         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00255 
00256         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00257         u_int16_t* values = new u_int16_t[rows*2];
00258         u_int32_t rowsRead = 0;
00259         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(rowsRead = dataPlane->GetDataRaw(0, 0, rows*2, values));
00260         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(rowsRead == rows);
00261 
00262         // Check the values
00263         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00264         {
00265                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00266                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row] == expected);
00267         }
00268 
00269         delete [] values;
00270 
00271         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00272 }

00274 void DataSetTest::testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw_InChunks()
00275 {
00276         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00277 
00278         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00279         int32_t chunks = 7;
00280         int32_t rowsPerChunk = rows/chunks;
00281 
00282         for (int32_t chunk = 0; chunk < chunks; ++chunk)
00283         {
00284                 int32_t startRow = chunk*rowsPerChunk;
00285                 u_int16_t* values = new u_int16_t[rows*2];
00286                 u_int32_t rowsRead = 0;
00287                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(rowsRead = dataPlane->GetDataRaw(0, startRow, rowsPerChunk, values));
00288 
00289                 int32_t rowsInArray = rowsPerChunk;
00290                 if (dataPlane->Rows() < startRow+rowsPerChunk)
00291                         rowsInArray = dataPlane->Rows() - startRow;
00292 
00293                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(rowsRead == rowsInArray);
00294 
00295                 // Check the values
00296                 for( int32_t row = startRow; row < rowsInArray+startRow; ++row )
00297                 {
00298                         u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00299                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(values[row-startRow] == expected);
00300                 }
00301 
00302                 delete [] values;
00303         }
00304 
00305         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00306 }

00352 
00353 void* DataSetTest::MapFile(const std::string& fileName)
00354 {
00355 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00356         if (fileHandle == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00357         {
00358                 // Create the file.
00359                 fileHandle = CreateFile(fileName.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ,
00360                                 NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
00361                 if (fileHandle == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00362                 {
00363                         return 0;
00364                 }
00365         }
00366         if (fileMapHandle == NULL)
00367         {
00368                 // Use the current size of the file.
00369                 DWORD dwSizeHigh = 0;
00370                 DWORD dwSizeLow  = 0;
00371                 fileMapHandle = CreateFileMapping(fileHandle, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, dwSizeHigh, dwSizeLow, NULL);
00372                 if (fileMapHandle == NULL)
00373                         return 0;
00374         }
00375         return fileMapHandle;
00376 #else
00377         return 0;
00378 #endif
00379 }
00380 
00381 void DataSetTest::UnmapFile()
00382 {
00383 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00384         if (fileHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00385         {
00386                 if (fileMapHandle != NULL)
00387                 {
00388                         CloseHandle(fileMapHandle);
00389                         fileMapHandle = NULL;
00390                 }
00391                 CloseHandle (fileHandle);
00392                 fileHandle = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00393         }
00394 #endif
00395 }
